strings.string: The distress signal pulses out into the dark of cosmic night, a cry unanswered
The comm unit flashes rthythmically, emitting soft beeps, the only sign aboard the ship of your cry for help
You resist the urge to check the distress signal, it's been transmitting fine
The distress signal continues to wail out into the void
The communications system continues to transmit your cry for help
The SOS signal has been sending, why is no one responding?
